sn9.13:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula bhikkhu kosalesu viharanti annatarasmim vanasande uddhata unnala capala mukhara vikinnavaca mutthassatino asampajana asamahita vibbhantacitta pakatindriya.
sn9.13:1.2: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata tesam bhikkhunam anukampika atthakama te bhikkhu samvejetukama yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn9.13:6.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu taya devataya samvejita samvegamapadunti.
